item.title: Sámi indigenous religion
item.description: Introduction References Further Reading https://www.mdpi.com/2077-1444/11/9/432/htm http://web.archive.org/web/20211013110929/https://amp.theguardian.com/world/2021/oct/13/sami-people-norway-ask-danish-queen-to-return-sacred-witchcraft-trial-drum https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sámi_shamanism Image Credits Banner Thanks to Nikola Johnny Mirkovic @thejohnnyme for making this photo available freely on Unsplash: https://unsplash.com/photos/vfaD7bscm7I
